subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
lead_paragraph: The horse had appeared as some rippling bolt of destiny, his very name conjured from myth: Big Brown, as timeless and plain as Shane or Paul Bunyan.
snippet: The horse had appeared as some rippling bolt of destiny, his very name conjured from myth: Big Brown, as timeless and plain as Shane or Paul Bunyan.
